name: Car City: Highway Racing MT
description:
Car City: Highway Racing MT!!!
Get behind the wheels of steering of sports car, turn the key, rev the engine and start your awesome racing car ride to conquer city streets and sky through crazy paths. Drift your luxury car in city traffic with insane fast speed and enjoy mix of high-octane riding and racing mode. Real racing competition, eminent of drifting, colossal ramps and endless racing is the game you have been waiting for. Start playing the fun now, experience the most terrifying stunts action, try new racing challenges against opponents and enjoy the endlessly hard exciting experience through amazing landscapes.
Features:
Console Quality Graphics
Cruise on different highways with different sports cars
Several of Camera Angles
Explore highway racing Environment
Fast nitro boosts reach crazy speed
Very smooth Control and interface
